title: Pakistan Foreign Direct Investment
description: Foreign Direct Investment in Pakistan increased by 83.90 USD Million in September of 2022. Foreign Direct Investment in Pakistan averaged 157.22 USD Million from 1997 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1262.90 USD Million in June of 2008 and a record low of -390.90 USD Million in October of 2018. This page provides - Pakistan Foreign Direct Investment- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: State Bank of Pakistan
